page.title: 02NORTH HUISH CHURCH-Education
page.content: {Church of England,}built 14th Century with Spire and three naves; the South one has been converted to accommodate Social activities, but is not yet complete. The bells cannot be used due to weakness of main structure. {Services}conducted by Rector of Diptford, who also has to cope with the Parishes of Harberton & Harbertonford. Ugborough has its own Church, but regretfully we have not been able to research this building,which is very old and beautiful. Services at North Huish are alternating - one week Holy Communion in the morning and the next Evensong. Nearest Primary School in Diptford and Secondary{Schools}in Totnes & Ivybridge. Children transported daily by MINIBUS through the narrow lanes.
